posts.post_content: It's been the lightning rod for *Magic* innuendo for years, [Twiddle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Twiddle)d more often than anything and whipped out by many an [Enlightened Tutor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Enlightened Tutor). No wonder creatures cringe when it hits the table.
